outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is the consolidation of family farming as a hub for sustainable development of the country through the improvement of public policies to support the segment.The project will achieve this through the following 3 Outcomes and their related Outputs: (i) Develop public policy instruments, aimed at supporting the marketing of inputs and diversification of family farming, (ii) Develop specific instruments of public policy, aimed at financing the production and protection and income of farmers and (iii) Develop specific components that help the consolidation of the National Technical Assistance and Rural Extension for family farming.

The objective of this project is the consolidation of family farming as a hub for sustainable development of the country through the improvement of public policies to support the segment.The project will achieve this through the following 3 Outcomes and their related Outputs: (i) Develop public policy instruments, aimed at supporting the marketing of inputs and diversification of family farming, (ii) Develop specific instruments of public policy, aimed at financing the production and protection and income of farmers and (iii) Develop specific components that help the consolidation of the National Technical Assistance and Rural Extension for family farming.

subnational.name: Ministerio do desenvolvimento Agrario, Brasilia, Brazil
